ygData.subject: Re: A new yahoo group
ygData.msgSnippet: You could think of EQ as an interactive chat room.  You talk to a lot of people and computer characters in your journey.  You could talk to your stepson and
ygData.messageBody:
You could think of EQ as an interactive chat room. You talk to a lot
of people and computer characters in your journey. You could talk to
your stepson and not even know it. I have several Real Life friends
in the game and we talk all the time. We group a lot as we are all
close to each other in levels. It makes things easier.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Pathfinder of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750

PS get in a Guild if you like talking to people!

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Colleen and Theresa
<crcarnevale@g...> wrote:
>
> well my step son plays it alot and wants me to join him playing i
thought it would be a nice way for us to get to know each other he
lives in kentucky ive never met him yet
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Wednesday, November 12, 2003 1:32 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Re: A new yahoo group
>
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Colleen and Theresa
> <crcarnevale@g...> wrote:
> >
> > so what is this game about ?
> >
> EverQuest is a massive online multiplayer adventure with various
> towns, cities, lands, dungeons, islands, and even planets. Well,
you
> can play on the planet Norrath and it's moon, Luclin. There are
also
> different planes of existence such as the Plane of Knowledge.
> It's a roleplaying game somewhat similar to Dungeons and Dragons.
You
> can play various races and classes and do quests and fight
monsters
> to gain experience and items.
> This description of mine doesn't do it justice. You should check
out
> http://www.everquestlive.com for more information.
> If you have any more questions I'll be happy to answer them to
the
> best of my ability.
> Have fun!
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
